docs.snippet: Teams for Thursday's 2014 World Cup Group D match between Uruguay and England at the Corinthians arena, Sao Paulo.
docs.lead_paragraph: Teams for Thursday's 2014 World Cup Group D match between Uruguay and England at the Corinthians arena, Sao Paulo.

docs.snippet: Mario Balotelli couldn't care less if he's mentioned in the same breath as Neymar or Lionel Messi at this World Cup — as long as he comes away with the trophy.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mario Balotelli couldn't care less if he's mentioned in the same breath as Neymar or Lionel Messi at this World Cup — as long as he comes away with the trophy.

headline.main: Balotelli: 'I Don't Want Stardom, I Want the Cup'
headline.print_headline: Balotelli: 'I Don't Want Stardom, I Want the Cup'

docs.snippet: Luis Suarez scored twice for Uruguay, including the game-winning goal in the 84th minute, in a 2-1 victory against England, who is all but mathematically eliminated now.
docs.abstract: Luis Suarez scored twice for Uruguay, including the game-winning goal in the 84th minute, in a 2-1 victory against England, who is all but mathematically eliminated now.

headline.main: Uruguay vs. England: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Uruguay's lethal striker Luis Suarez scored twice including a dramatic late winner to earn a 2-1 victory over England in a pulsating World Cup Group D match on Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay's lethal striker Luis Suarez scored twice including a dramatic late winner to earn a 2-1 victory over England in a pulsating World Cup Group D match on Thursday.

headline.main: Lethal Suarez Gives Uruguay 2-1 Win Over England
headline.print_headline: Lethal Suarez Gives Uruguay 2-1 Win Over England

docs.snippet: Brazilian police arrested 14 people accused of throwing fireworks at English fans outside a bar in Sao Paulo on Thursday, hours before England were to play Uruguay in the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian police arrested 14 people accused of throwing fireworks at English fans outside a bar in Sao Paulo on Thursday, hours before England were to play Uruguay in the World Cup.

headline.main: Police Arrest 14 for Throwing Fireworks at English Fans
headline.print_headline: Police Arrest 14 for Throwing Fireworks at English Fans

docs.snippet: Dropping to the turf on the left knee that was surgically repaired less than a month ago, Uruguay striker Luis Suarez was euphoric. Scoring a second goal against England sealed a 2-1 win on Thursday to revive Uruguay's World Cup campaign and cap a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Dropping to the turf on the left knee that was surgically repaired less than a month ago, Uruguay striker Luis Suarez was euphoric. Scoring a second goal against England sealed a 2-1 win on Thursday to revive Uruguay's World Cup campaign and cap a remarkable recovery.

headline.main: Suarez Gives Uruguay 2-1 Win Over England
headline.print_headline: Suarez Gives Uruguay 2-1 Win Over England

docs.snippet: Protesters smashed the windows of luxury cars inside a dealership, trashed banks and fired powerful fireworks at police during a demonstration that drew about 2,000 Thursday as Brazil's biggest city hosted a World Cup match.
docs.lead_paragraph: Protesters smashed the windows of luxury cars inside a dealership, trashed banks and fired powerful fireworks at police during a demonstration that drew about 2,000 Thursday as Brazil's biggest city hosted a World Cup match.

headline.main: Protest Draws 2,000 in Brazil on Cup Match Day
headline.print_headline: Protest Draws 2,000 in Brazil on Cup Match Day

docs.snippet: One moment, Wayne Rooney madly celebrated the triumph of ending years of criticism for his World Cup struggles. Then, the England striker left the field with his head down in disappointment.
docs.lead_paragraph: One moment, Wayne Rooney madly celebrated the triumph of ending years of criticism for his World Cup struggles. Then, the England striker left the field with his head down in disappointment.

headline.main: Rooney's First Career World Cup Goal Not Enough
headline.print_headline: Rooney's First Career World Cup Goal Not Enough

docs.snippet: South American dark horses Colombia cantered into the World Cup knockout round on Thursday and 2010 semi-finalists Uruguay put hapless England on the brink of elimination with a Luis Suarez-inspired 2-1 win.
docs.lead_paragraph: South American dark horses Colombia cantered into the World Cup knockout round on Thursday and 2010 semi-finalists Uruguay put hapless England on the brink of elimination with a Luis Suarez-inspired 2-1 win.

headline.main: Uruguay, Colombia Make It South America's World Cup Day
headline.print_headline: Uruguay, Colombia Make It South America's World Cup Day

docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez said his two-goal match-winning performance against England in Thursday's 2-1 win in World Cup Group D was the perfect response to his critics.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez said his two-goal match-winning performance against England in Thursday's 2-1 win in World Cup Group D was the perfect response to his critics.

headline.main: Take That England, Says Joyful Suarez
headline.print_headline: Take That England, Says Joyful Suarez
